organizationName.label: Full name of the organization
organizationName.info: In Ukrainian (in accordance with the Charter)

certificateOfRegister.label: Certificate of entry into the register
certificateOfRegister.info: To download the document, click on the paperclip icon or the 'Download file' button. jpg, jpeg, png or pdf format. The maximum size is 5 MB.

dateOfRegistrOrganization.label: Date of registration of the organization

positionOrganization.label: Position of the organization's representative
positionOrganization.infoAddl: For example: Manager, IA, Accountant, etc.

email.label: Representative's e-mail address (e-mail)
email.info: This email address will be your login. You will receive a letter to the specified email address regarding the results of processing your registration request.

site.label: Internet page of the organization (website)
site.info: Include the organization's website. For example: https://gozhivi.com.ua/

socialNetworks.label: Link to the social network
socialNetworks.info: Add links to social media (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Youtube, etc.). For example: https://www.facebook.com/gozhivi
